name: Acclamator II-Class Assault Ship
effect: Bombard 4 (This unit may attack a unit in the Ground arena instead of a unit in the Space arena with 4 power plus any other effects.)

name: Anakin Skywalker (L)
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Anakin gets +6 power for this attack.
Pay 3 Force -> Evade 2
"Sometimes I wonder what is happening to the Jedi Order . . . I think war is destroying the principles of the Republic."

name: Anakin Skywalker (M)
effect:
Starfighter and Capital Ship Pilot. The Starfighter or Capital Ship gets:
* +10 speed.
* Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 1
"I won't lose you, Padmé."

name: Anakin's Starfighter (A)
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1
Critical Hit 1 (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)
Equipment costs 1 less Force and 1 less build point to attach to this unit.

name: ARC-170 Starfighter
effect: The precursor of the Z-95 Headhunter and eventually the X-wing, the Aggressive ReConnaissance fighter was manufactured by the Incom/Subpro Corporation.

name: AT-AP
effect:
Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)
Critical Hit 1 (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)
Designed to combine heavy firepower with mobility, the AT-AP represents the Republic's next generation of assault walkers.

name: AT-RT
effect:
Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)
Because it lacked a sealed cockpit, the All-Terrain Recon Transport had great visibility and was useful against enemy infantry, but was a poor choice against speeders or air units.

name: Bail Organa (B)
effect:
Pay 2 build points, Tap -> Tap one of your opponent's units. Play only during your build step.
"Senator Mon Mothma and I are putting together an organization . . . ."

name: BARC Speeder
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
The "Biker Advanced Reconnaisance Commando" Speeder was used by clone troops on Felucia and elsewhere.

name: Blaster Pistol
effect:
Pay 0 build points -> Equip
Equipped Character unit gets +1 power.
The standard ranged weapon of both military personnel and civilians in the galaxy, the blaster pistol fires cohesive bursts of light-based energy called bolts.

name: Blaster Rifle
effect:
Pay 1 build point -> Equip
Equipped Character unit gets +1 power and Critical Hit 1.
Larger, more accurate, and more deadly than the blaster pistol, the blaster rifle is supposed to be for military use only. That has not stopped untold numbers of them from leaking to the general population.

name: Buzz Droid
effect:
You may choose not to untap this unit during your untap step.
When the Space battle step starts, if this unit is tapped, put a damage counter on the last unit it attacked.

name: C-3PO (I)
effect:
At the start of the Character battle step, you may either look at the top card of your deck or look at the top card of your opponent's deck. You may put that card into its owner's discard pile.
"Have the protocol droid's mind wiped." -- Bail Organa
"Oh, dear." -- C-3PO

name: Chancellor's Office
effect:
At the start of the Character battle step, your opponent loses 1 Force.
"These are times when we must all endure adjustments to the Constitution in the name of security." -- Chancellor Palpatine

name: Chewbacca (L)
effect:
Overkill (During this unit's attack, you may divide hits in excess of the defending unit's health between that unit and another unit in the same arena.)
"Chewbacca, good friend am. For your help, much gratitude and respect, I have." -- Yoda

name: Chewbacca (M)
effect:
When you deploy Chewbacca, choose another deployed Character unit. When that unit would be discarded, you may remove all damage counters from that unit and discard Chewbacca instead.
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept
Pay 2 Force -> Retaliate 4
Chewbacca was an ally of the Republic long before he met Han Solo.

name: Combined Squadron Tactics
effect:
Pay 4 Force -> Choose three of your Space units with different speeds. Each of those units gets +3 power this turn. Play only if you control three Space units with different speeds.
The Battle of Coruscant was one of the largest space battles of the Clone Wars.

name: Commerce Guild Droid 81-X
effect:
Critical Hit 2
Ion Cannon 2
Businesses involved in the acquisition, refinement, and production of raw materials form the backbone of the Commerce Guild, which is headed by its shrewd president, Shu Mai.

name: Commerce Guild Starship
effect:
Put 1 damage counter on this unit -> Gain 1 build point. Play only during your build step.
Shields 1

name: Confusion
effect:
Pay 5 Force -> Choose an arena. Tap all units in that arena.
"How many more Jedi managed to survive?" -- Obi-Wan
"We have heard from none." -- Yoda

name: Coruscant Emergency Ship
effect:
Pay 0 Force -> Prevent up to 2 damage to one of your Ground units. Use this ability only once per turn.
The emergency vehicles of Coruscant are equipped to handle the incendiary, chemical, and nuclear hazards of spaceflight.

name: Coruscant Shuttle
effect:
When you deploy this unit, you may search your deck for a Jedi card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1
On a planet completely enveloped in urban sprawl, there is an insatiable need for speeders and shuttles.

name: Darth Sidious (E)
effect:
Pay 3 Force, Tap -> Put 3 damage counters on any Ground or Character unit and 1 damage counter on Sidious. (Placing damage counters cannot be prevented.) Play only during your build step.
Pay 3 Force -> Evade 2
"I will soon have a new apprentice . . . One far younger and more powerful than Lord Tyranus."

name: Darth Sidious (F)
effect:
Discard one of your units from any arena -> Gain any combination of build points or Force equal to half of that unit's build cost (round down).
Pay 2 Force -> Deflect 1
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2
"The remaining Jedi will be hunted down and destroyed."

name: Darth Sidious (G)
effect:
Each of your opponent's activated abilities that cost 0 or more Force costs 1 additional Force to play.
Pay 4 Force, discard one of your units from any arena -> Gain control of one of your opponent's units in the same arena with equal or less build cost until end of battle. Play only during your build step.
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 2
"The death of Lord Tyranus was a necessary loss, which will ensure our victory."

name: Darth Tyranus (H)
effect:
Pay 4 Force -> Deflect 2 (Prevent 2 damage to Tyranus, and Tyranus may do that much damage to a unit of your choice in the Character arena.)
"Twice the pride, double the fall. I have looked forward to this, Skywalker."

name: Darth Tyranus (I)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2
Equipment costs 1 less Force and 1 less build point to attach to this unit.
Dooku was a man of remarkable character and lineage. His birthright as the Count of Serenno also afforded him incredible wealth, which he used in his political career as the Separatist leader.

name: Darth Vader (Q)
effect:
As long as Vader is attacking a Jedi, he gets +2 power for that attack. As long as Vader is attacking a Jedi Padawan, he also gets Accuracy 1. (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
Pay 4 Force -> Evade 2
"Anakin Skywalker, you are one with the Order of the Sith Lords. Henceforth, you shall be known as Darth . . . Vader." -- Darth Sidious

name: Darth Vader (R)
effect:
Hidden Cost 5
Damage from Vader cannot be prevented.
Pay 2 Force -> Deflect 1
Pay 3 Force -> Evade 2
"Don't lecture me, Obi-Wan. I see through the lies of the Jedi. I do not fear the dark side, as you do. I have brought peace to my new empire . . . ."

name: Darth Vader (S)
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Put 3 damage counters on any Character unit. Play only when Vader would attack.
Armor
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2
"Twisted by the dark side, young Skywalker has become. The boy you trained . . . Gone he is . . . Consumed by Darth Vader." -- Yoda

name: DC0052 Intergalactic Airspeeder
effect: Critical Hit 1 (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: Destroyer Droid, Q Series
effect:
Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking this unit.)
When the Character battle step starts choose one: this unit gets +10 speed and Stun 3 until end of battle, or this unit gets +1 power and Accuracy 1 until end of battle.
The bloodthirsty, cannibalistic insectoids of Colla IV designed the droideka, or destroyer droid, in their own frightening image.

name: Dismiss
effect: Pay 4 Force, discard a card from your hand -> Disrupt a Battle card or activated ability. (That card or ability has no effect.)

name: Diving Attack
effect: Choose a Space unit. That unit gets +2 power and Critical Hit 1 for this attack. (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: Droid Battlestaff
effect:
Pay 1 build point -> Equip
Equipped Character unit gets +2 power and Stun 2. (When the unit with this Equipment damages another unit, that unit gets -2 power until end of turn.)

name: Droid Missiles
effect: Discard this unit from the Space arena -> Put 3 damage counters on a unit in the Space arena. Play only when Droid Missiles would attack.

name: Droid Security Escort
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept
Accuracy 1
Stun 3
One of Emperor Palpatine's first decrees was to ban all military droids.

name: Droid Tri-Fighter
effect:
Critical Hit 1 (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)
This droid-piloted fighter is subjected to g-forces no living pilot could withstand.

name: Elite Guardian
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept
Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 3 (If a unit in the same arena as this unit is attacking this unit, this unit does 3 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: Engine Upgrade
effect:
Pay 2 build points -> Equip
Equipped Space unit gets +20 speed.
The most popular model of sublight drive is the basic Hoersch-Kessel ion drive. Internal fusion reactions generate charged particles that are hurled from the rear of the vessel, producing thrust.

name: Foil
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Disrupt a Mission. (That Mission has no effect.)

name: Force Dodge
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Prevent up to 4 damage to one of your units.

name: GH-7 Medical Droid
effect:
Tap -> Remove up to 3 damage counters from one of your Characters. Play only when no unit is attacking.
"Medically, she is completely healthy. For reasons we can't explain, we are losing her."

name: Grand Moff Tarkin (D)
effect:
Each of your Capital Ships and Battle Stations gets +1 power and Critical Hit 1.
Tarkin saw the Death Star as the ultimate weapon of fear.

name: Hardcell-Class Transport
effect:
Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking this unit.)
At the end of the Space battle step, discard 1 card.
Pay 1 build point -> Draw 2 cards. Play only during your build step.

name: HAVw A6 Juggernaut
effect: The HAVw could hold a crew of 12 and featured 1 heavy laser turret, 2 medium anti-personnel laser cannons, 2 rocket-grenade launchers, and 2 small twin blaster cannons.

name: Homing Missiles Salvo
effect:
Pay 4 Force -> Do 6 dice of damage to any Space unit.
Besides explosives, many Trade Federation missiles contained deadly buzz droids.

name: IBC Hailfire Droid
effect: The sequenced magpulse drives along the circumference of the hoop-wheels push the droids along at impressive speeds. Missile launcher pods give these droids a very long reach.

name: Instill Doubt
effect: Choose a unit. That unit can't use activated abilities this turn.

name: It Just Might Work
effect:
Choose a Space unit, a Ground unit, and a Character unit you control. At the end of your turn, if each of those units is in the arena it started in, you gain 8 Force.
"Anakin, this is no time for jokes. We are in serious trouble here." -- Obi-Wan

name: Jar Jar Binks (C)
effect:
Discard a card, Tap -> Gain 1 build point. Play only during your build step.
Pay 1 build point, Tap -> Draw a card.
Lucky 2

name: Jedi Concentration
effect:
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 2 of those cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
"In a dark place we find ourselves . . . A little knowledge might light our way." -- Yoda

name: Jedi Lightsaber
effect:
Pay 1 build point, 1 Force -> Equip
Equipped Jedi Character or Sith Character unit gets +2 power and "Pay 2 Force -> Deflect 1."
Adegan crystals of the Osuss system are ideal for the creation of lightsabers, as they focus the energy released from a lightsaber's power cell into the tight, blade-like beam.

name: Jedi Master's Deflection
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Prevent up to 3 damage to one of your Jedi Character units. That unit may do that much damage to a unit of your choice in the same arena.

name: Jedi Piloting
effect: Pay 1 Force -> Prevent up to 2 damage to a Space or Ground unit.

name: Kashyyyk System
effect:
Each of your Space units that doesn't already have Retaliate gets "Pay X Force -> Retaliate X," where X is equal to the unit's power.
Kashyyyk is a world enveloped in immense forersts. The trees aer so tall and dense that a layered ecosystem has evolved within its branches. Wookiees inhabit the upper levels of the forest, having built massive cities within the interwoven canopy.

name: Lightsaber Quick Draw
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Choose a Character arena or Ground arena where you have a Jedi. Reveal a unit card from your hand. Lightsaber Quick Draw deals 4 dice of damage to each of your opponent's units in that arena with a speed less than the speed of the unit card you revealed.

name: Mace Windu (F)
effect:
When the Character battle step ends, gain 1 Force.
Pay 2 Force, reveal the top card of your deck -> Mace gets +X power for this attack, where X equals the build cost of the revealed card. If it is a Battle card, you may play it during the current play or pass sequence as if it were in your hand; otherwise put it in your discard pile.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2
"The Jedi will not continue to be your personal executioners, Chancellor."

name: Mas Amedda (A)
effect:
At the start of the Character battle step, if you have no other units in the Character arena, retreat Mas Amedda.
Put a damage counter one one of your units -> Gain 1 build point. Play only during your build step.
Mas Amedda was the Vice-Chair of the Galactic Senate during Chancellor Valorum's term, a position he held a decade into Chancellor Palpatine's rule.

name: Meditate
effect:
Draw 2 cards and gain 2 Force.
Meditation is one of the tenets of the Jedi way.

name: Mustafar Battle Grounds
effect:
You may deploy this Location to the Ground or Character arena.
At the start of the battle step in the arena where this Location is deployed, put 1 damage counter on each unit in that arena.

name: Mustafar System
effect: When the Space battle step ends, if you control the Space arena, gain 1 Force.

name: Naboo Star Skiff
effect: When you finish building this unit, you may search your deck for a Naboo Character, show it to your opponent, and put it into your build zone with 1 build counter on it. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Nos Monster
effect:
This unit gets +30 speed as long as there is an Aquatic Location in play.
Nos monsters are native to the underwater caves of Utapau.

name: Nute Gunray (D)
effect:
Pay 2 build points, Tap -> Look at your opponent's hand. You may choose and discard a card from his or her hand. Play only during your build step.
"Excellent! Has my new apprentice, Darth Vader, arrived?" -- Darth Sidious
"He landed a few moments ago." -- Nute Gunray
"Good, good. He will take care of you." -- Darth Sidious

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (L)
effect:
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* +10 speed.
* +1 power
* Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1
* When the Space battle step ends or when this unit is discarded, you may move Obi-Wan from this unit to the Character arena.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2
"Flying is for droids!"

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (M)
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Obi-Wan's attack dice.)
Pay 3 Force -> Evade 2
"I'm running out of tricks here!"

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (N)
effect:
As long as Obi-Wan Kenobi is attacking a Dark Jedi, he gets +2 power and Accuracy 1 for that attack.
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 2
"I have a bad feeling about this."

name: Padmé Amidala (G)
effect:
Discard Padmé from the Character arena -> Gain 2 Force and draw 2 cards.
Your opponent can't attack Padmé unless he or she pays 2 Force.
"Obi-Wan, there is good in him. I know there is . . . Still . . . ."

name: Padmé Amidala (H)
effect:
Your opponent can't attack a Diplomat unless he or she pays 2 Force.
Tap -> Draw a card and gain 1 Force. Play only during your build step.
"It's hard to believe everything to which we have dedicated our lives is gone."

name: Palpatine's Sanctum
effect: Whenever Vader damages one of your opponent's Jedi and that unit is discarded, put two mastery counters on Palpatine's Sanctum. Vader gets +1 power and +1 health for each mastery counter on Palpatine's Sanctum.

name: Patrol Mode Vulture Droid
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking this unit.)

name: Plo Koon's Starfighter (A)
effect:
Critical Hit 2
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 1
The Jedi prefer smaller, more maneuverable craft that let them maximize their Force-enhanced piloting skills.

name: Power Attack
effect: Choose a Character unit. That unit gets +2 power and Critical Hit 1 for this attack.

name: R2-D2 (J)
effect:
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* Lucky 3. (Each attack, you may reroll 3 of this unit's attack dice or have your opponent reroll 3 attack dice against it.)
* At the start of the Space battle step, remove 1 damage counter from this Starfighter.
* Any Starfighter with R2-D2 on it can have an extra Pilot if that Pilot isn't an Astromech Droid.

name: R4-P17 (A)
effect:
Tap -> Choose one: gain 1 build point, or remove up to 2 damage counters from one of your Starfighters or Speeders.
R4 was Obi-Wan's trusty astromech droid.

name: Rage of Victory
effect:
Choose an arena. Whenever one of your opponent's units in that arena is discarded this turn, each of your units in that arena gets an additional +4 power until end of turn.
"Good, Anakin, good. I knew you could do it. Kill him. Kill him now!" -- Chancellor Palpatine

name: Recusant-Class Light Destroyer
effect: When you finish building this unit, choose Ground, Space, or Character. You may search your deck for 2 cards of the chosen type, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Republic Assault Gunboat
effect: Shields 1 (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking this unit.)

name: Republic Fighter Wing
effect: This unit gets +1 power for each other unit you have in the Space arena.

name: Sacrifice the Expendable
effect: Discard one of your Ground units. If you do, discard one of your opponent's Ground units with build cost 5 or less.

name: Security Droid
effect: Battle droids were the rank-and-file soldiers of the Trade Federation.

name: Separatist Fleet
effect: Remove 2 Trade Federation, Commerce Guild, Techno Union, Banking Clan, or Separatist cards in your discard pile from the game -> Remove 1 damage counter from this unit. (You don't need to choose two cards with the same subtype to use this ability.)

name: Sith Lightsaber
effect:
Pay 1 Force, 1 build point -> Equip
Equipped Jedi Character or Sith Character units gets +2 power and Critical Hit 2.
The Sith prefer synthetic crystals to generate their lightsaber blades. While the crystals are being forged in a blazing furnace, it is not uncommon for a Sith to reach out with the Force to increase their potency.

name: Spinning Slash
effect: Pay 5 Force -> Choose one of your Jedi Character units. Each time that Jedi attacks this turn, when it's attack ends, choose a unit in the Character arena that it can attack but hasn't attacked this turn. The Jedi Character attacks that unit. Play only when no unit is attacking.

name: STAP Squad
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
The Separatists relied almost entirely upon droids for their military. Even their supreme strategist, General Grievous, was more than half droid.

name: Strike with Impunity
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Your opponent can't activate Retaliate abilities this turn.
"In order to ensure our security and continuing stability, the Republic will be organized into the first Galactic Empire, which I assure you will last for ten thousand years." -- Emperor Palpatine

name: Stubborn Personality
effect: Stacks can't be rearranged this turn. Neither player can stack cards from his or her hand or from the build zone onto unique units this turn.

name: Super Battle Droid 7EX
effect:
When this unit is discarded from the Character arena, draw 2 cards.
Critical Hit 2
The super battle droid design incorporates many existing components from the standard battle droid, but packages them in a much sturdier shell.

name: Surge of Strength
effect: Pay 4 Force -> The unit of your choice gets +5 power until end of battle.

name: Tank Droid
effect:
Armor (This unit is hit only on a 5 or more.)
To protect its assets, the Corporate Alliance maintained a military of combat automata, including a fearsome brand of soulless tank droid capable of storming enemy compounds in an instant.

name: Techno Union Interceptor
effect: As long as you have no other units in the Space arena, Techno Union Interceptor gets +10 speed, +1 power and +1 health.

name: TF Battle Droid Army
effect:
This unit gets -1 power for each damage counter on it.
While droids are fiercely loyal, they are not known for their grasp of strategy and are especially vulnerable to ion weapons.

name: Theta-Class Shuttle
effect:
Shields 1
Discard Theta-Class Shuttle from the Space arena -> Return a Character card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Thread the Needle
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Prevent all damage to one of your Space units.
"Hang on, Artoo. I am going to pull them through the needle . . . ."

name: Thwart
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Disrupt an activated ability. (That ability has no effect.) The disrupted ability may not be activated again this turn.
"Are you threatening me, Master Jedi?" -- Palpatine
"The Senate will decide your fate." -- Mace Windu
"I am the Senate!" -- Palpatine

name: Trade Federation Cruiser
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
Bombard 3 (This unit may attack a unit in the Ground arena instead of a unit in the Space arena with 3 power plus any other effects.)

name: Treachery
effect:
Look at your opponent's hand. Choose one of those cards. Your opponent discards it.
"Now we must move quickly . . . Go to the Jedi Temple . . . Do what must be done, Lord Vader. Do not hesitate. Show no mercy." -- Darth Sidious

name: Unexpected Attack
effect: This turn, fight the Character Battle first, then the Ground Battle, then the Space Battle.

name: Unity of the Jedi
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Play only if you have three Jedi with different names in the Character arena. Each of those Jedi units gets +2 power and Accuracy 1 this turn. (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: Utapau Sinkhole
effect:
Each Ground unit loses 1 power and 10 speed unless it's a Creature or Aquatic.
The sinkholes of Utapau are enormous, featuring their own unique ecosystems.

name: Utapau System
effect: Each of your Space units gets Critical Hit 1. (This unit does 1 more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: V-wing Clone Starfighter
effect: When this unit is discarded from the Space arena, draw a card.

name: Vehicle Shields Package
effect:
Pay 2 build points -> Equip
Equipped Space or Ground unit gets Shields 1. (Each unit gets -1 power as long as it's attacking the unit with this Equipment.)
Most starships carry some form of shielding technology to protect them not only from the natural hazards of space travel, but also enemy attacks.

name: Vehicle Weapons Package
effect:
Pay 1 build point -> Equip
Equipped Space or Ground unit gets +2 power.
Most starships have some form of weaponry, laser cannons being the typical choice. However, larger ships often support turbolaser turrets, proton torpedos, and even ion cannons.

name: Venator-Class Destroyer
effect:
This unit gets +1 power for each damage counter on it.
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1

name: Vulture Droid Starfighter
effect: Critical Hit 1 (This unit does one more damage if you roll at least one natural six.)

name: Yoda (J)
effect:
When attacked Yoda is, at the top 4 cards of your deck look. Into your hand one of those cards put. On the bottom of the deck the rest put.
Lucky 2 (You may reroll 2 of this unit's attack dice and force your opponent to reroll 2 attack dice against it.)
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2
"Destroy you, I will."

name: Yoda (K)
effect:
When discarded from play Yoda is, 4 Force gain, and into your hand Yoda put.
Pay 2 Force -> Deflect 2
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1
"Destroy the Sith, we must."
